column4: U.S. Supreme Court wrestles with Microsoft data privacy fight
column5: WASHINGTON Supreme Court justices on Tuesday wrestled with Microsoft Corp's dispute with the U.S. Justice Department over whether prosecutors can force technology companies to hand over data stored overseas  with some signaling support for the government and others urging Congress to pass a law to resolve the issue.

column4: UPDATE 3-U.S. Supreme Court wrestles with Microsoft data privacy fight
column5: * Microsoft challenged warrant for emails stored in Dublin (Adds quotes from Justices Alito  Roberts  company lawyer)

column4: Microsoft clashes with Justice Department at U.S. Supreme Court
column5: WASHINGTON  Feb 27 The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday wades into a major privacy rights fight between Microsoft Corp and the Justice Department  weighing whether U.S. law allows prosecutors to compel technology companies to hand over data stored overseas.

column4: Microchip Technology in talks to buy Microsemi - source
column5: Feb 27 Chipmaker Microchip Technology is in talks to buy Microsemi Corp  the largest U.S. commercial supplier of military and aerospace semiconductor equipment  a source familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.
